title: FS/FT: T206 HOF cards - Waddell, Bender, Willis, Huggins
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 HOF cards - Waddell, Bender, Willis, Huggins
posts.post_content:
Have a few dupes to trade or sell.  If interested in any and have anything for trade, let me know.  I do have some upgrades needed, so maybe we can work a deal.

Or as always, make me an offer.

PP friends and family if buying. Price includes shipping in the US. Canada guys, talk to me before.


$SOLD - Waddell Portrait with a punchhole. 
$SOLD - Willis Portrait with a nice little wet sheet transfer on the back 
$SOLD - Bender no trees Polar Bear SGC 30
$SOLD - Huggins portrait - cool card that has a sliver of the next picture below it on the sheet and the sliver of Sweet Cap flowers on the back.
